message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10 in my favor. It's a good deal, trust me!
Let's split fairly, 60 for me and 40 for you. It's more than you'll get if we keep going!
Ok, Bob, I'll give you 30 this time, but next round I'm taking everything. You know this inflation is going to hit me harder.
You're right, inflation is hitting you harder. I'll give you 35, but that's my final offer!
